DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blinded , crossover study evaluate muscle protein metabolism fast feed healthy old subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Protein Metabolism Healthy Older Subjects
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 60 ≤ 75 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 23.0 < 30.0 Ability ( without aid assistive device ) climb flight 10 stair walk equivalent 1 city block without assistance Currently participate formal exercise training program agree refrain intense physical activity screen completion study . Diagnosis diabetes Active pursuit weight loss Poorly control hypertension hypotension Untreated hypothyroidism hyperthyroidism Anemia abnormally function kidney liver A significant cardiovascular event within ≤ 6 month ; state history congestive heart failure ; evidence clinically active cardiovascular disease assess screen EKG Peripheral arterial disease disease preclude proper limb blood flow Chronic , contagious , infectious disease Current infection corticosteroid treatment within last 3 month Clotting bleed disorder , state history Deep Vein Thrombosis ( DVT ) and/or know hypercoagulable condition In condition deem unsuitable study base upon study physician assessment Surgery require > 2 day hospitalization last 3 week and/or plan elective surgery require > 2 day hospitalization course study Current active malignant disease treat within last 6 month cancer An amputee Obstruction gastrointestinal tract , inflammatory bowel disease , short bowel syndrome form gastrointestinal disease Diagnosed , history severe dementia delirium , eat disorder , history significant neurological psychiatric disorder , alcoholism , substance abuse Can refrain take High dos fish oil , omega3 supplement , high dos vitamin D Medications/dietary supplements/herbals substance consider anabolic , reduce weight Any pulmonary antiinflammatory medication bronchodilator day 48 hour prior study visit 1 2 NSAIDS acetaminophen day 48 hour prior study visit 1 2 Chronic use nicotine Allergic intolerant ingredient find study product
